message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. However, I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway between $150 and $100. How about $125?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110?
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about $115?
I appreciate the willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $112?
Hi Bob, I understand you're really close to your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $112. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about $114?
